snippet.title: Official The Firm Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Firm by Sunnyside Games

Welcome to THE FIRM,

Your profil retained our full consideration and we have the pleasure to inform you that your application as a Senior Trader in our Investment division has been accepted. Your new office is ready and we await your arrival as soon as possible.

We wish you a warm welcome in our company, and we hope that your first day in The Firm won’t be your last one.

Sincerly,
Your boss.

****

THE FIRM is a puzzle video game focusing on the emotional toll of working as a trader inside a big corporation. Every decision you'll make will be evaluated and will have an impact on your profits. Don’t make any mistake and you will be the richest Man in the entire world… Disobey and you will have to manage the consequences.

Features:

• Simple and addictive arcade-style gameplay
• Black market bonuses (but it's a secret :))
• Game Center Leaderboards to compete against your friends

Having any comments or suggestions? We would love to hear from you! Reach us at: hello@sunnysidegames.ch

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/the-firm/id883108531?mt=8

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/SunnysideGames

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/sunnysidegames

Homepage:

http://www.sunnysidegames.ch/
